problem.markdown:
>> Suppose that a CPU has an L1 cache access time of 10 ns. Also, assume that the main memory access time is 100 ns. Say that the cache hit rate is 90%, and the same object is read 10 times.
===== Concretely, fill in the blanks: =====
Total access time without cache enhancement = _____ ns
= 1000
===== Total access time with cache enhancement = _____ ns
= 190 <<
problem.label:
Suppose that a CPU has an L1 cache access time of 10 ns. Also, assume that the main memory access time is 100 ns. Say that the cache hit rate is 90%, and the same object is read 10 times.
Concretely, fill in the blanks: Total access time without cache enhancement = _____ ns
Total access time with cache enhancement = _____ ns
